main.name: John DeLucia
main.description: I am a data scientist specializing in the strategic transformation of unstructured data into valuable insights. With a strong foundation in Mathematics and Statistics from Boston University, I have honed my skills in querying databases, developing KPIs, and implementing statistical models to derive actionable recommendations.
main.bio: From my early role as a data analyst to my current position as a Lead Data Scientist at Resupply Inc, I have consistently contributed to business development by leveraging my expertise in PostgreSQL, statistical tools, and geographical visualization. As a forward-thinking professional, I am eager to bring my analytical acumen and passion for problem-solving to any strategic business development role.
main.contactmessage: If you have any further questions or would like to discuss my qualifications in more detail, feel free to reach out to me using the contact information provided.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some skills I have acquired from my experiences listed above and the degree to which I am proficient in them.

education.degree: B.A. in Mathematics and Statistics, Minor in Economics
education.description: Through rigorous coursework, I honed analytical thinking, mathematical proficiency, and gained a strong foundation in statistical methodologies. This education equipped me with essential skills for data science, fostering a commitment to continuous learning and adaptability.

work.title: Lead Data Scientist
work.description: Queried PostgreSQL databases, developed KPIs, modeled trends in customer behavior, and built geographical visualization tools. Created documentation of procedures and scripts for reusability.

work.title: Data Engineer Intern
work.description: Created and automated procedures for workflow management. Designed tracking tools for new client onboarding projects. Implemented Git best practices on legacy feature release procedures. Developed production build and release pipelines with Azure DevOps.

work.title: Software Product Manager
work.description: Translated and prioritized upper management's product vision for a team of software engineers. Developed a project management system in ClickUp.
